description:
runtime: handle runtime.Goexit during init

Fixes issue 5963.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM
I can't think of any reasonable use case for this, though

On Fri, Jul 26, 2013 at 6:02 AM, <dvyukov@google.com> wrote:

> LGTM
> I can't think of any reasonable use case for this, though
>

Agreed, but that doesn't mean it should fail with an internal runtime error.

Russ

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=94668c624b84 ***

runtime: handle runtime.Goexit during init

Fixes issue 5963.

R=golang-dev, dsymonds, dvyukov
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/11879045

subject: code review 11879045: runtime: handle runtime.Goexit during init
